leaflet.constituency: West Cornwall and the Isles of Scilly

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight for more skilled jobs with better pay to help make it easier to buy a home and improve living standards.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Support for the Vulnerable and Older People
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure vulnerable and older people receive the help they need and feel safe and valued.
Secure the investment needed to regenerate areas such as Mounts Bay and secure investment in public transport.

issues.economy: More skilled jobs with better pay to improve living standards.
issues.socialWelfare: Support for vulnerable and older people to feel safe and valued.

housing.content: Make it easier to buy a home.

images.caption: Derek Thomas with a flag of the United Kingdom in his suit's pocket.
